title: 2009년 Rivera 사건
summary: 미국 New York, NY 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Rivera. 판결일: 2009-11-04. 법원: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: The People of the State of New York v. Jose Rivera
**판결일**: 2009-11-04
**법원**: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York
**관할**: New York, NY

## 인용

- 67 A.D.3d 711
- 886 N.Y.S.2d 893

## 판결문 요약


Appeal by the defen*712dant from a judgment of the County Court, Suffolk County (Gazzillo, J.), rendered October 30, 2007, convicting him of burglary in the second degree, upon his plea of guilty, and imposing sentence.
Ordered that the judgment is affirmed.
We have reviewed the record and agree with the defendant’s assigned counsel that there are no nonfrivolous issues which could be raised on appeal. Counsel’s application for leave to withdraw as counsel is granted (see Anders v California, 386 US 738 [1967]; People v Paige, 54 AD2d 631 [1976]; cf. People v Gonzalez, 47 NY2d 606 [1979]).
This defendant has not, nor could he have, raised any nonfrivolous issues in his supplemental pro se brief. Fisher, J.P., Florio, Angiolillo, Eng and Roman, JJ., concur.
...
